member.name: T:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.NntpClient
member.summary: NNTP Client extending a System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient to send/receive NNTP command/responses.

member.summary: Connects to the specified server.
member.param: Server address.
member.returns: The server's greeting response.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.NntpClient.Connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connects to the specified server.
member.param: Server address.
Server port.
member.returns: The server's greeting response.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.NntpClient.Authenticate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Authenticates the given user.
member.param: Username to log in.
Password.
member.returns: True if authentication succeded.

member.summary: Authenticates the given user and SASL mechanism.
member.param: Username to log in.
Password.
SASL Mechanism to be used.
member.returns: True if authentication succeded.

member.summary: Closes the connection.

member.summary: Retrieves the server's newsgroups that have been created since the specified date/time.

member.returns: The server's newsgroups that have been created since the specified date/time.

member.summary: Retrieves the server's newsgroups that have been created since the specified date/time.
member.param: The minimum creation date/time.
Specifies if startDate is GMT or not.
member.returns: The server's newsgroups that have been created since the specified date/time.

member.summary: Retrieves the server's newsgroups that have been created since the specified date/time.
member.param: The minimum creation date/time.
Specifies if startDate is GMT or not.
Distribution filter of the articles.
member.returns: The server's newsgroups that have been created since the specified date/time and that contain articles for the specified distribution.

Minimum addition date of the articles.
member.returns: The article message-ids

member.param: Newsgroup to be checked.
Minimum addition date of the articles.

The distribution filter of the articles.
